/* Hide title block, first content div (which includes title header) */
.quarto-title-block,

/* Optional: remove vertical spacing in main content area */
main.content,
main {
  padding: 0 !important;
  margin: 0 !important;
  width: 100% !important;
}

/* Optional: override default column widths in pkgdown layout */
 .row, .col-md-9, .col-md-3 {
  width: 100% !important;
  max-width: 100% !important;
  margin: 0 !important;
  padding: 0 !important;
}

/* Full viewport iframe */
iframe {
  width: 100%;
  height: calc(100vh - 56px); /* adjust if navbar height changes */
  border: none;
  display: block;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}
